body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Charles Richardson and the customer's name is Maria Turner.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Charles Richardson, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Charles, I'm Maria Turner. I'm just looking for some information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Maria! What information are you looking for today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m feeling a bit overwhelmed with all the motorcycle options available. I want to make sure I choose the right one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That’s completely understandable, Maria. Can I ask you a couple of questions to better help you? What’s your age, if you don’t mind sharing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I am thirty five years old.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you! And could you also provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! I live in the zip code seven zero seven one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Maria. This will help me narrow down the options to find the perfect motorcycle for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Charles. This is making me feel a lot better.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m glad to hear that! Thank you for your time today, Maria. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out anytime. Have a great day!
